name: FINIGARD 301
description: FINIGARD 301 is a water based, PUD Sealer for Chrome (III) passivated, Zinc- and Zinc-alloy electroplated surfaces. It was developed to meet the demands of the automotive, window fitting and construction industry. It provides increased corrosion protection and improved optical appearance. The iridescence of passivated surfaces can be effectively reduced, leading to a homogeneous color tone and appearance.
